text: The Bob's Burgers Movie is a 2022 American musical comedy movie based on the television series Bob's Burgers created by Loren Bouchard, who co-wrote, co- produced and directed in his feature directorial debut with Bernard Derriman. The original voice cast of the series reprise their roles, including H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy, John Roberts, Kristen Schaal, Zach Galifianakis, and Kevin Kline. The movie premiered at the El Capitan Theatre in Hollywood on May 17, 2022. It was released on May 27, 2022, by 20th Century Studios in the United States, after almost two years of delays due to the COVID-19 pandemic. ==Premise== A ruptured water main creates a sinkhole right in front of Bob's Burgers, blocking the entrance and ruining the Belchers' plans for a successful summer. While Bob and Linda struggle to keep the business afloat, the kids try to solve a mystery that could save their family's restaurant. title: The Bob's Burgers Movie
